mapper.insert: insert into sys_dic_comms (id, dep_code, dic_code, dic_name, dic_value, dic_explain, dic_type, `state`, remark1, remark2) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_dic_comms set dep_code = #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_code = #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_name = #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_value = #{dicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_explain = #{dicExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_type = #{dicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, dep_code, dic_code, dic_name, dic_value, dic_explain, dic_type, `state`, remark1, remark2 from sys_dic_comms where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
